name: Inktober Challenge
description:
So its now october and everyone is starting their #Inktober bits of art.

So Im gonna join in, but not just drawings. Im going to make games!

31 GAMES in a month!

Oh god im going to die.

Rules:

1.  Outside of minor tweeks, no game can be changed once midnight passes on the day.
2. Each game must be self contained.
3. While a game might not be uploaded on the same day, it must be uploaded ASAP
4. The next game may be started before the day but cannot be uploaded till the day.

==========

Day. 1 RING

You are a ring around the planets, but you are dying jump from world to world to claw back what little time you have left.

Click and hold, Pullback and release to shoot your ring forward.

=========

Day 2. Mindless

Move the Zombies by picking them up and dropping them
(I also uploaded the test build >.<)

=======

Day 3 Bait

fishing game, not made

=====
